title: anudinam paNI
sahitya:
anudinam paNI manamE aNuvAvi malaiyOnai nI 


anupallavi

  iniyadOr shuvaiyODu sunaippunal perugavE hanumanukku anru tan aruLaip-purindOnai


caraNam    karu mEham tiraLAga kavizhndanda azhaganin kazhal aDiyait-tazhuvi tozhuvadu pOlavE
karam iraNDum unadu siramEl kuviyavE harahara murugA murugA aruLvAi enavE
